name: Chester Aaron's Very Garlic Pasta
keywords: garlic, linguine, parmesan, main course, spring
recipeIngredient: 6 Spanish Roja garlic cloves, minced (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the linguine in a large pot of boiling water until tender, about 7 minutes. While the pasta is cooking, place the oil in a skillet over medium heat. When warm, add the garlic, tossing, for 2 minutes. Add the nuts and season with the salt and pepper.
Drain the pasta. Toss with the nut sauce. Add the basil and parsley. Adjust seasoning and serve with grated Parmesan cheese on the side.
